options_page_header_2.description: Name of extension in navigation sidebar

options_tab_general.description: Name in sidebar for General tab

options_tab_advanced.description: Name in sidebar for Advanced tab

options_tab_help.description: Name in sidebar for Help tab

options_tab_contribute.description: Button in navigation sidebar to support Adblock Plus

options_readMore.description: Read more element that shows tooltip with description

options_blocking_title.description: Blocking section name in General tab

options_language_title.description: Ad blocking list option name in General tab

options_language_title_tooltip.description: Top part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip.message: The default filter list is based on your browser's language settings. If you live in Germany, your default filter list is German+English. However, if you live in Germany and frequently visit Italian websites, you need to subscribe to the Italian filter list. To maintain optimal performance, it is recommended to select only the language that you need.

options_language_title_tooltip_notes_1.description: First bottom part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip_notes_1.message: Consider: Sometimes ads appear because your filter lists are not up to date. If this is the case, itâ€™s recommended to manually update all your filter lists. You can do that by going to Advanced > Update all filter lists.

options_language_title_tooltip_notes_2.description: Second bottom part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip_notes_2.message: If you still see ads, please report them in our Adblock Plus sub-forum under Help > Forum > Filters for Adblock Plus.

options_language_add.description: Add other language button in General Tab

options_furtherBlocking_title.description: Blocking list option name in General tab

options_furtherBlocking_title_tooltip.description: Tooltip description for 'More blocking options' section in General tab
options_furtherBlocking_title_tooltip.message: By default, Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, including video ads, animated ads, noisy ads, flashy banners, pop-ups, pop-unders and much more. In addition to ads, Adblock Plus can also block tracking, malware, social media buttons and more to increase your safety and privacy online.

options_popular.description: Popular label in further blocking options table

options_furtherBlocking_add.description: Button name for adding other blocking list in General tab

options_exceptions_title.description: Exceptions section name in General tab

options_acceptableAds_title.description: Acceptable ads option name in General tab

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_1.description: First part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_1.message: Since many websites rely on advertising revenue, we encourage the use of noninstrusive advertising.

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_2.description: Second part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_2.message: The Acceptable Ads initiative, which supports both users and website owners, is a set of strict guidelines that identifies acceptable ads. Ads meeting these criteria are displayed to users.

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_3.description: Third part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_3.message: You can, however, disable this feature at any time and browse ad-free.

options_acceptableAds_description.description: Acceptable ads descriptive name in General tab

options_whitelisted_add.description: Button label for adding whitelisted website

options_whitelisted_empty.description: Text shown when list of whitelisted websites is empty
options_whitelisted_empty.message: There are no websites in your whitelist.

options_whitelisted_title.description: Whitelisting option name in General tab

options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_1.description: First top part of tooltip description for 'Whitelisted domains' section in General tab
options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_1.message: You can allow a website to display ads by adding it to your whitelist.

options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_2.description: Second top part of tooltip description for 'Whitelisted domains' section in General tab
options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_2.message: This means that Adblock Plus is completely deactivated on the whitelisted site. Ads and other annoyances, such as tracking scripts, may be activated.

options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_notes.description: Bottom part of tooltip description for 'Whitelisted domains' section in General tab
options_whitelisted_title_tooltip_notes.message: Note that this feature is different from whitelisted Acceptable Ads.

options_tweaks_blockElement.description: Show block Element option in Advanced tab

options_faq_title.description: FAQ section name in Help tab and link label in same section

options_faq_description.description: FAQ section description in Help tab
options_faq_description.message: You only need to refresh your blocking list in "Advanced" very often, but there are also other known problems.

options_forum_title.description: Forum section name in Help tab

options_forum_description.description: Forum section description in Help tab
options_forum_description.message: If the frequently asked questions helped you can reach us in our forum.

options_media_title.description: Social media Section name in Help tab

options_media_description.description: Social media section description in Help tab
options_media_description.message: If there are major problems with Adblock Plus which affects all of our users, we tell you in our social media channels.
